about_the_game:
Ventomori is a 3D asynchronous puzzle co-op that places you centre stage as intrepid astronauts on their way to Planet M-113, Xanahspati, hoping to unveil the secrets behind a mysterious distress call. 

Join forces to brave the unknown

Choose to be the eyes from above on the space station as the Control player or conquer your fears as you plunge headfirst towards planet Xanahspati as the Scout. Work in tandem to solve puzzles, manage your oxygen, and ensure each other’s survival as you traverse. But be careful, silence here… is quite deadly.

Discover the past, reveal the future

Towering ruins of intrigue await in this narrative driven world. Take in the melancholic sights and deduce the history of the unseen Padullurians as you navigate around monoliths of ancient, alien technology and the planet’s harsh, bone-rending winds.

If at first you don’t succeed…

Try and try again to hone your experience with each attempt. Draw out every last breath of your oxygen and overcome your struggles together till you reach the end. The digital bodies may fade, but the everpresent minds remember.

name: Ventomori

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Brave the treacherous unknown and endeavour for survival on a deadly, desolate planet. Be the eyes from above or the scout on the ground and work together with a friend to uncover the mysteries and escape from the planet Xanahspati in this asymmetrical multiplayer co-op puzzle game.
